channel.title: Hood River County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Hood River County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84
item.description: 2nd St. North in Hood River at I-84 onramps. Use I-84 west for Portland; use I-84 east for The Dalles.

item.title: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84
item.description: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East to The Dalles. Continue ahead for OR-35 to White Salmon (Washington) via Toll Bridge and I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 64
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 64 - OR-35/Mt. Hood Highway/White Salmon/Government Camp. OR-35 crosses the Columbia River north of here, connecting to White Salmon, Washington. The next crossing of the Columbia River eastbound is in The Dalles. Westbound, the next crossing is at Cascade Locks.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84 West
item.description: 2nd St. North at I-84 West to Portland, at Exit 63 onramp.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84
item.description: 2nd St. North in Hood River at I-84onramps. Use I-84 west for Portland; use I-84 east for The Dalles.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 62
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 62 - US-30/West Hood River/Westcliff Drive. US-30 leaves I-84 here through the city of Hood River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 58
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 58 - Mitchell Point Overlook.
